properties.name: Litochoro
properties.description: At the foothill of Mount Olympus, this town is home to quaint streets and traditional food. The views of the mountain are captivating, a timeless spectacle throughout the year. Nature and culture co-exist in perfect harmony in this peaceful place.

properties.name: Plaka
properties.description: Settlement by the sea, offering long beaches and clear waters suitable for swimming, only a few kilometers away from Litochoro and Mount Olympus. You can also find a plethora of food choices in taverns and restaurants.

properties.name: Mount Olympus
properties.description: Located in the northern part of mainland Greece, it's the mythical residence of the Greek Gods and currently a treasured hiking destination. Thanks to its high altitude, you can experience a variety of landscapes, from lush green forests and clear water streams to rocky terrains that resemble alpine scenery.
